## Description

Adds Giotto points to an existing Giotto object


## Usage

```r
addGiottoPoints(gobject, gpoints)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`gobject`     |     giotto object
`gpoints`     |     list of giotto point objects, see [`createGiottoPoints`](#creategiottopoints)


## Value

giotto object
